name: Path Y
description:
This game was made in two days for the 22th edition of the GM(48) game jam.

Thy mind doth take thee once again wh're thy soul wanteth to beest and
thee can doth nothing else than trying to intermit t 'r descend into
madness and findeth true enlightenment.

And coequal if 't be true thee wont findeth a purpose by playing
this game 'twill nontheless holp thee cope with the futile nature of t
all.

If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
